card.name: Bûthrakaur the Green
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Bûthrakaur. One strike. May be keyed to Moria and The Under-gates. Effect: If not defeated, this card becomes a short-event targeting the site it was keyed to. Any non-unqiue orc or troll hazard creature may be keyed to the site during the movement/hazard phase. Discard at the end of the movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Chill Douser
card.text: Three strikes. Detainment against a Ringwraith company. Effect: If the attack is not cancelled, this card becomes a short-event targeting the company. All undead attacks against the company receive +1 strike and +1 prowess. At the end of the turn, this card is placed where it would otherwise have been placed based on the results of the attack.

card.name: Durin's Bane
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of The Balrog. Spawn. Two strikes. May be keyed to The Under-gates or any site that lists the Under-gates as an adjacent site. If Doors of Night is in play, may be keyed to any Under-deeps site.

card.name: Little Snuffler
card.text: One strike. This attack’s body is modified by -2 for each Ranger in the defending company. Effect: If not defeated, this card becomes a short-event played on the defending company. All Scouts lose their Scout skill. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Nameless Thing
card.text: Two strikes. Three attacks. May be keyed to any Under-deeps site. If Doors of Night is in play, may be keyed to surface sites and c. Action: Tap a character in the defending company to cancel an attack from this card. This may be done up to twice.

card.name: Spider of the Môrlat
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Two strikes. May be keyed to Dol Guldur and the Sulfur-Deeps. If Doors of Night is play, may be keyed to Southern Mirkwood, Heart of Mirkwood, Woodland Realm, and adjacent sites of The Sulfur-Deeps. Special: May also be played as a permanent event, in which case the following applies: The Sulfur-Deeps receives an additional automatic-attack: Spider — Two strikes at 16 prowess, 9 body. This attack is never detainment. Action: You may use one against the hazard limit to return this card to your hand.

card.name: Stirring Bones
card.text: Two strikes. Detainment against a Ringwraith company.

card.name: Umagaur the Pale
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Umagaur. One strike. May be keyed to Moria and The Under-gates. Effect: If not defeated, this card becomes a short-event targeting the site it was keyed to. Any non-unqiue orc or troll hazard creature may be keyed to the site during the movement/hazard phase. Discard at the end of the movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Wisp of Pale Sheen
card.text: One strike. Attacker assigns all strikes. Detainment against a Ringwraith company. Any character with less than 6 mind must tap if possible after facing a strike from this attack.

card.name: An Unexpected Party
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf with a mind greater than 5. All other Dwarves in the company do not count against the company size limit. Dwarves with less than 3 mind cost no influence to be controlled, and such Dwarves played during the organization phase do not count against the one character/turn limit. Trigger: Discard this card if the company contains a non-dwarf, non-avatar character with a mind greater than 5 or more than one non-dwarf, non-avatar character. When this card is discarded, immediately discard Dwarf characters as necessary to reach the company size limit. May not be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Ancient Stair
card.text: Playable on a company at a surface site. Opponent may draw up to twice the normal number of cards for this company during step 6 of the movement process. When the company leaves their current site, place it off to the side with this card. Special Movement: During the end-of-turn phase, after hand size is resolved, if the company is at an Under-deeps site, replace their site with the card set off to the side with this card. Then discard this card. May not be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Armory
card.text: Once per organization phase, you may place a minor item weapon, shield, armor, or helmet off to the side with this card. Such an item may come from your hand or sideboard. Any item placed off to the side with this card may be played as though it were in your hand. A maximum of two items may be placed off to the side with this card.

card.name: Await the Advent of Allies
card.text: Playable on a non-Avatar character with a mind of six or less at a non-H site. Character may not move. Character does not count against GI and its mp are ignored for all purposes. Trigger: Discard this card when a character in the bearer’s company plays a resource. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Balance Between Powers
card.text: Environment. No environment cards can be played.

card.name: Barrow-blade
card.text: Playable on a Dagger of Westernesse if its bearer taps during the site phase at a R. This item does not tap the site when played and may be played at a tapped site. The bearer of the Dagger of Westerness receives a further +1 to prowess and also receives a further +2 to prowess when facing a Nazgûl or Undead strike. Cannot be duplicated on a given Dagger.

card.name: Choice of Lúthien
card.text: Unique. Playable on Arwen if she is at Minas Tirith. Action: Tap Arwen to take one item, ally, or faction playable at her current site from your play deck or discard pile into your hand, reshuffling the play deck if searched. Trigger: Discard if Arwen is at a site not in Anórien, Lebennin, Lamedon, Belfalas, or Anfalas.

card.name: Crown of Flowers
card.text: Environment. You may at any time when a resource event would be playable place that resource off to the side with this card. The resource is considered to be played and in play as though Gates of Morning were in play and Doors of Night were not. Trigger: Discard Crown of Flowers when the resource is discarded.

card.name: Cup of Farewell
card.text: Minor Items are playable at Hero H. If at least three copies of this card are in play, Minor Items may be played at tapped Hero H and do not tap such sites when so played. Action: If at least two copies of this card are in play, you may tap a character at one of your Hero H during the organization phase to take a Minor Item from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Dark Numbers
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Playable on an untapped Scout immediately after facing an Orc, Troll, or Man attack. Tap the Scout. Can be stored at a H. Action: Tap bearer to modify an influence check against a faction by +3.

card.name: The Dwarves Are upon You!
card.text: Playable on a company containing Dwarves facing an attack before strikes are assigned. All Dwarves in the company receive +2 to prowess and -1 to body against the attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given company. Discard after the attack is faced.

card.name: Enduring Tales
card.text: When any player discards a card from his hand, he may discard it to the top of his play deck (and always face down) instead of to his discard pile. Additionally, the number of mp required to end the game increases by two.

card.name: Eyes of Mandos
card.text: Playable on an untapped Pallando during the organization phase. Tap Pallando and reveal up to up to eight cards from the top of your play deck. Choose one to put into your hand and shuffle the remaining ones into your play deck.

card.name: Face out of Sight
card.text: On-guard cards may not be played. At the end of any turn, all wounded and tapped agents are returned to their owner’s hands.

card.name: Fate of the Ithil-stone
card.text: Playable on a company at Minas Tirith or Isengard if the company controls a Lost Knowledge card. Trigger: Tap this card if the company plays a Palantír; this card never untaps. Trigger: If this card is tapped, invert it if the company enters Barad-dûr and plays a Stolen Knowledge card during the same site phase. If this card is inverted, you receive this card’s mp and all Palantíri in play give +1 mp and -1 corruption points. Once inverted, no other copy of this card may be inverted.

card.name: Fifteen Birds in Five Firtrees
card.text: Playable on a company using region movement facing a hazard creature attack keyed by name or type to a region. Company immediately moves to a site in the region the creature was keyed to and the movement/hazard phase proceeds to step ten. The creature is discarded and its attack is not faced. Company may do nothing during the site phase. Discard if the company successfully moves to a new site. May not be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Fireworks
card.text: Playable on an untapped Sage at a tapped B or F. Tap Sage. Make a roll and add the mind of the Sage (+10 if an avatar) — if the result is greater than 12, the site untaps. Action: The next time the Sage would otherwise become untapped, make him tapped instead and discard this card.

card.name: First of the Order
card.text: Playable on an item Saruman bears. The item gives one less corruption point to a minimum of one. Discard if the item is no longer borne by Saruman.

card.name: Forewarned Is Forearmed
card.text: Any non-Dragon Lair site with more than one automatic-attack is reduced to having one automatic-attack of the hazard player’s choice; this attack is cannot be canceled. Any creature with more than one attack is reduced to one attack of the hazard player’s choice; this attack cannot be canceled. Discard when such an attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Free to Choose
card.text: Playable on an item that normally gives 3 corruption points or more. Target item gives 2 fewer corruption points. Discard after its bearer makes a corruption check. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Hall of Fire
card.text: Playable on a Hero Haven. Action: At the beginning of the site phase, one character at this site may untap or heal.

card.name: Healing of Nimrodel
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a moving company whose site of origin is a Hero H. If the company moves to another Hero H this turn, all wounded characters in the company heal (from wounded to untapped) and all tapped characters untap at the beginning of step 10 of the movement process. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Herb-lore
card.text: Playable on Radagast if at a site in a w or if there is a w in his site path. Action: Discard this card to heal all wounded characters in Radagast’s company and then to untap all untapped characters.

card.name: Here Is a Snake!
card.text: Playable at the end of step 6 of the movement process. Opponent may reveal to you any number of hazards from his hand. He may only play hazards he revealed to you (including on-guard cards) for the remainder of the movement process or Playable on any face-down agent. The agent is tapped and revealed.

card.name: Hidden Knife
card.text: Playable on any face up site being used by an Agent. Action: You may key hazard creatures from your hand to the site; such creatures attack the Agent as though the Agent were a character. You do not receive mp if the Agent is eliminated. Discard at the end of the turn or when the Agent is wounded or when the Agent moves.

card.name: Hobbit-lore
card.text: Playable on Gandalf during the organization phase. He receives +2 EI against Hobbit characters and +2 to influence checks against Hobbit factions. Action: You may tap Gandalf to untap a Hobbit character in his company. Action: You may tap this card to discard Fireworks.

card.name: Horns, Horns, Horns
card.text: Each player regardless of alignment removes all factions from his discard pile and shuffles them into his play deck.

card.name: Hour of Need
card.text: Playable on an untapped non-Warrior, non-Avatar Diplomat during the organization phase if you have a faction in your hand. Reveal the faction. Tap the Diplomat, who then makes an influence attempt on this faction. This influence check is modified by -2 and a further -1 for each region between the Diplomat’s current site and the faction’s home site (including the regions of both sites). If the attempt is successful, the faction is played in their home region, not tapping the site nor requiring an untapped site. If the attempt is unsuccessful, discard the Diplomat and faction.

card.name: Hundreds of Butterflies
card.text: Playable on a moving character. Untap the character and increase the hazard limit against his company by one.

card.name: The Hunt
card.text: Playable on Alatar during the organization phase. Name a hazard creature card. Your opponent must immediately play the hazard creature card from his discard pile or reveal his discard pile if the hazard creature card is not there. If played, the creature immediately attacks Alatar as though he were a one-character company. Alatar cannot use or benefit from spells against this attack, and is considered to control no allies.

card.name: I Know Much about You
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat. Action: Tap Diplomat to cancel a card declared earlier in the same chain of effects which would tap an Agent or Action: Tap Diplomat to cancel one attack from a hazard creature card with more than one attack. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Into Dark Tunnels
card.text: Playable during step 10 of the movement process on a company using Under-deeps movement. The company may attempt to move to an additional site using Under-deeps movement.

card.name: Lore Of The Rings
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a company containing a Sage controlling a Lost Knowledge card at a site where Gold Ring Items are playable. Trigger: Tap this card if the company controls a Lost Knowledge card and plays a Ring Special Item; this card never untaps. Action: If this card is tapped, during the site phase at Ost-in-Edhil, you may have each character in the company make a corruption check modified by -4. After the corruption checks, this card is inverted. Once inverted, no other copy of this card can be inverted. Action: If this card is inverted, you can store this card at a H. If stored, you receive this card’s mp, and all Ring Items give one less corruption point. Trigger: Discard this card if tapped or inverted and the company no longer contains a Sage, a Lost Knowledge Card, and a Ring Special Item.

card.name: Knowledge of the Enemy
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Playable on an untapped character at a S or D or playable on a character facing an Agent strike. Tap the character. Action: Can be stored at a H. If stored, you receive this card’s mp. Action: If this card is stored, you may discard this card when a non-unique hazard would otherwise be discarded to remove it from play instead.

card.name: Mallorn
card.text: Unique. Playable only if you have stored Earth of Galadriel’s Orchard at Bag End. Hero characters may heal at any version of Bag End as though at a H. Action: You may tap this card to untap Bag End during the untap phase. Your copy of Bag End is never discarded or returned to the location deck. All Hobbit factions are worth +1 mp.

card.name: Memories Recalled
card.text: Lost Knowledge. Playable on an untapped Sage. Tap the Sage. Action: Discard this card to discard one corruption card in the bearer’s company.

card.name: More Alert than Most
card.text: The number of strikes of any attack that assigns all strikes is reduced by one to a minimum of one. If Gates of Morning is in play, such an attack is reduced by a further strike to the same minimum. Discard when such an attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: No Waiting to Wonder
card.text: Playable on an untapped Hobbit when another character in his company is facing a strike. Tap the Hobbit. The prowess of the strike is modified by -1 and its body by -1. If the strike is successful, the Hobbit also suffers the effects of the successful strike.

card.name: Ordered to Kill
card.text: Each revealed Agent must attack if a company enters their current site. Additionally, any unrevealed on-guard cards are discarded when they would otherwise be returned to their owner’s hand.

card.name: Palm to Palm
card.text: Playable on a company without an avatar. The mind of each character and ally in the company is increased by one. Action: A character in the company may tap to give +2 to a roll which can remove a corruption card. Trigger: Discard this card if an avatar joins the company.

card.name: The Doors of Dol Guldur
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Playable on a company if the company controls a Stolen Knowledge card. Action: You may tap this card during the site phase if the company successfully plays Rescue Prisoners at Dol Guldur or rescues characters taken prisoner there. This card never untaps. Once tapped, no other copy of this card can be tapped. Action: If tapped, this card can be stored at a H. When stored, all automatic-attacks at all D and all S receive -1 prowess and -1 strike. If stored, your receive this card’s mp.

card.name: Rebuild the Town
card.text: Playable during the site phase after facing any automatic-attacks on a non-Under-deeps R that does not contain a hoard. The site becomes a B and loses all automatic-attacks.

card.name: Saw Further and Deeper
card.text: Playable only if your avatar is not revealed. +5 GI. Your avatar may only be brought into play at his home site. Discard when you bring your avatar into play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Secret Ways
card.text: The roll required to move between adjacent Under-deeps sites is decreased by 4. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Sentinels of Númenor
card.text: Any attempt by any player to influence a faction playable at a site in Anórien, Lebennin, Belfalas, or Anfalas, or Lamedon is modified by -2 and Muster may not be played to modify it. Place any such faction you successfully influence with this card. All factions under this card give an extra mp. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Smoke Rings
card.text: Bring one resource or character from your sideboard or discard pile into your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: Token of Goodwill
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat whose company is facing an attack of one of the types listed below. Target Diplomat makes a corruption check. If he does not fail, discard an item from his company as listed below and make an influence check. If the result is greater than the listed values, the attack is cancelled and you may take one resource from your play deck or discard pile into your hand, reshuffling the play deck if searched. Dragon: Greater Item/5 Drake: Major Item/6 Man or Agent: Minor Item/7

card.name: The Uttermost Foundations
card.text: Playable on a company at an Under-deeps site during the organization phase. Trigger: Tap this card if the company successfully moves to a different Under-deeps site; this card never untaps. Action: If tapped, this card may be stored at a H. If stored, you receive this card’s mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Vein of Arda
card.text: Playable on an untapped Sage or Dwarf during the site phase at an Under-deeps site. Tap the character. Bearer may not untap. Action: This card may be stored at a H during the organization phase.

card.name: When You Know More
card.text: Playable on an untapped Sage during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. Tap the Sage. Action: Tap the sage to modify one influence check by a character in his company by +2. Sage makes a corruption check.

card.name: The Windlord Found Me
card.text: May not be played by a Fallen-Wizard player. Playable at an untapped Isengard, S, or D during the site phase. Tap the site. The company faces an attack: Orcs — 4 strikes at 9 prowess. Afterwards, a character may tap and place this card under him; discard this card if no character taps. The bearer may not untap until this card is stored at a H. Action: This card may be stored at a H during the organization phase. Action: If stored, tap this card to search your play deck for a copy of your avatar, put it in your hand, and reshuffle the play deck. Action: If stored, tap this card to discard an event which has taken your avatar prisoner. May not be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Withdrawn to Mordor
card.text: Playable on a face-up Agent. If the Agent has a mind of 5 or less, it is returned to its owner’s hand. If its mind is 6 or greater, is tapped if untapped and returned to its owner’s hand otherwise or Playable on an on-guard card. The on-guard card is discarded.

card.name: Aiglos
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at any Under-deeps S or D. If bearer is a Warrior, he receives +2 prowess and +1 body. If Doors of Night is in play, bearer receives +3 to prowess. -2 to the body of any strike the bearer faces. +3 to bearer’s EI against Elf characters. +3 to influence checks by the bearer against Elf factions.

card.name: Dragon-helm
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at any Under-deeps D or S. If bearer is a Warrior, he receives +1 to prowess and +2 to body. Action: Tap Dragon-Helm to cancel a Dragon or Drake attack against the bearer’s company.

card.name: Dwarven Light-stone
card.text: Playable at any Under-deeps site. Modify any rolls made during step 4 of the movement process by +2. Action: Tap this item to modify by -2 the prowess of one attack whose strikes cause a character to ignore the prowess benefit of weapons. Action: Tap this item when the bearer is facing an Orc or Troll attack to modify its prowess by -2.

card.name: Forgotten Scrolls
card.text: Lost Knowledge. Can also be played at a tapped Minas Tirith. Cannot be included with a starting company. Action: When this card is successfully played, it creates an attack: Trap — 1 strike at 9 prowess. This attack may not be canceled and the strike is assigned to the bearer. Action: You may discard this card at a R to make Information playable there until the end of the turn. Action: You may discard this card at a R where Information is playable to untap it.

card.name: Gems of Arda
card.text: Playable at Glittering Caves. If you have stored a Vein of Arda, playable at any Under-deeps site. Action: Tap a character during the organization phase when you store this item to place a non-special item from your hand or discard pile with the character. This item must be the same as an item your opponent has stored; your opponent discards his copy of the item.

card.name: Leaf Brooch
card.text: You may discard this item instead of another item in the bearer’s company if such must be discarded.

card.name: Lost Tome
card.text: Lost Knowledge. Cannot be included with a starting company. Action: When this card is successfully played, it creates an attack: Trap — 1 strike at 9 prowess. This attack may not be canceled and the strike is assigned to the bearer. Action: You may discard this card at a S or D to make Information playable there until the end of the turn. Action: You may discard this card at a S or D where Information is playable to untap it.

card.name: Mithril
card.text: Unique. Playable by a Sage or Dwarf at the Under-Gates if a character there bears a Map to Mithril. Bearer may not untap. Action: When Mithril is stored, search your play deck, sideboard, and/or discard pile for a non-unique weapon, armor, shield, or helmet item and place it with a character in the storing company, reshuffling the play deck if searched. Special: When Mithril is stored, each Dwarf in play must immediately make a corruption check modified by -3, starting with Dwarves of the storing player. Each of these corruption checks considered the initiation of a separate Chain of Actions, and your opponent may play resources to aid these corruption checks.

card.name: Necklace of Girion
card.text: Unique. Playable by a Man at The Lonely Mountain. Bearer receives +3 EI against Dwarf and Man characters and +3 to influence checks against Dwarf and Man factions.

card.name: Noldo-lantern
card.text: Playable at any Under-deeps site. Modify any rolls made during step 4 of the movement process by +2. Action: Tap Noldo-Lantern if bearer is facing an Undead, Orc, Troll, or Nazgûl before strikes are assigned to modify it by -2 prowess and -1 strike (to a minimum of one strike).

card.name: Phial of Galadriel
card.text: Unique. Playable on a non-avatar bearer of a Ring Special Item if in the same company as Galadriel. Action: Bearer may tap to cancel an Undead or Spider attack he is facing. Action: You may tap this item when the bearer is facing a hazard creature attack keyed to S, D, s, d to modify it in the following manner: The attack receives -2 prowess, and the defender assigns all strikes. Action: Tap this item to give +2 to any corruption check by its bearer. Cannot be transferred or stored. May not be discarded unless its bearer is discarded.

card.name: Lindion the Oronín
card.text: Unique. Action: Tap this ally to cancel a Spider or Animal attack his company is facing.

card.name: Mistress Lobelia
card.text: Unique. Trigger: If not at Bree, Old Forest, The White Towers, or a site in The Shire during the site phase, discard Mistress Lobelia. Action: You may tap Mistress Lobelia during the site phase to search your play deck or discard pile for a resource item playable at her current site. Place the resource in your hand and reshuffle your play deck if searched.

card.name: Noble Hound
card.text: May be played even if the site is tapped. When facing an attack, the first strike assigned to this ally’s controller is instead assigned to this ally. May not be duplicated on a given character. Action: You may discard this ally to discard a prisoner-taking card played on a strike the ally’s controller is facing.

card.name: Folco Boffin
card.text: Unique. Folco Boffin allows Hobbit characters to be played at his current site during the organization phase.
